problem_text_cn: 如图,在△ABC中,BD、CE是角平分线,AM⊥BD于点M,AN⊥CE于点N．△ABC的周长为30,BC=12．则MN的长是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, BD and CE are angular bisectors, AM ⊥ BD at point M, AN ⊥ CE at point N. The perimeter of △ABC is N_0, BC = N_1. Then the length of MN is ()
raw_answer: 证明:∵△ABC的周长为30,BC=12．∴AB+AC=30-BC=18．延长AN、AM分别交BC于点F、G．如图所示:∵BN为∠ABC的角平分线,∴∠CBN=∠ABN,∵BN⊥AG,∴∠ABN+∠BAN=90°,∠G+∠CBN=90°,∴∠BAN=∠AGB,∴AB=BG,∴AN=GN,同理AC=CF,AM=MF,∴MN为△AFG的中位线,GF=BG+CF-BC,∴MN=\frac{1}{2}(AB+AC-BC)=\frac{1}{2}(18-12)=3．故选:D．z\in\hat{x}(\lambda)
raw_comment: 本题考查了等腰三角形的判定与性质、三角形中位线定理,熟知三角形的中位线平行于第三边,并且等于第三边的一半是解答此题的关键
